lines.gurmukhi: ibn piRX ishjw Bvn Awn rUp rMg dyKIAY skl jmdUq BY BXwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Bin Priy Sihajaa Bhavan Aan Roop Ranga , Daykheeai Sakal Jamadoot Bhai Bhayaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Without the presence of my beloved by my side, all these comfortable beds, mansions and other colourful forms look frightening like the angels/demons of death.

lines.gurmukhi: ibn piRX rwg nwd bwd gRXwn Awn kQw lwgY qn qICn dush aur bwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Bin Priy Raag Naad Baad Gyaan Aan Kadaa , Laagai Tan Teechhan Dousah Ur Baan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Without the Lord, all modes of singing, their melodies, musical instruments and other episodes spreading knowledge touch the body as sharp arrows pierce the heart.

lines.gurmukhi: ibn piRX Asn bsn AMg AMg suK ibKXw ibKmu AO bYsMqr smwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Bin Priy Asan Basan Ang Ang Soukha , Bikhayaa Bikhamu Au Baisantar Samaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Without dear beloved, all delicious dishes, comfort-giving beds and other pleasures of various kind look like poison and horrible fire.

lines.gurmukhi: ibn piRX mwno mIn sll AMqrgq jIvn jqn ibn pRIqm n Awn hY ]574]
lines.transliteration_english: Bin Priy Maano Meen Salal Antaragata , Jeevan Jatan Bin Preetam N Aan Hai ?574?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a fish has no other aim than living in the company of its beloved water, I have no other purpose of life than living with my beloved Lord.  (574)
